sagex.phoenix.scrapers.xbmc

Class XbmcUrl

  • java.lang.Object
    • sagex.phoenix.scrapers.xbmc.XbmcUrl

  • public class XbmcUrl
extends java.lang.Object
    This represents the "smart" url of the xbmc metadata. It has to understand the concepts of post, spoof, etc.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      XbmcUrl(org.w3c.dom.Element url)
      Creates an XbmcUrl from an Element.
      XbmcUrl(org.w3c.dom.Element url, XbmcScraper xbmcScraper) 
      XbmcUrl(java.lang.String url)
      Creates xbmc url from string.
      XbmcUrl(java.lang.String url, XbmcScraper xbmcScraper)
      Creates an XbmcUrl from a given xml url fragment, and stores a reference from the scraper that created the url fragment.

      • XbmcUrl

        public XbmcUrl(java.lang.String url,
               XbmcScraper xbmcScraper)
        Creates an XbmcUrl from a given xml url fragment, and stores a reference from the scraper that created the url fragment. This is typically used when processing fragments during scraping.
        Parameters:
        url -
        xbmcScraper -
